attributes.action: Publish the criteria for decisions on Covid travel lists
attributes.additional_details: The government should be transparent about the rationale for taking decisions that affect millions of people.
attributes.background: The government is not being clear on why decisions on the international travel lists are taken. The government should be transparent about the rationale behind these decisions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587003
